name: Trouble with Violets
description: Trouble with Violets combines Trouble Brewing and Sects & Violets characters, creating an interesting blend of classic and experimental gameplay with enhanced outsider mechanics.
author: Ben Burns
specialRules: Combines Trouble Brewing and Sects & Violets
Interesting blend of classic and experimental
setupNotes: This script provides a transition between the base Trouble Brewing and the more complex Sects & Violets. The outsider mechanics create additional tension and strategy.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: TB fundamentals with SV-style logic traps. Keep poisoning/falsehood sources light to preserve TB readability.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Use TB anchors and then probe for SV-style distortions. Evil: Look TB-honest while inserting one clean contradiction path.
bluffing: Blend classic TB bluffs with a subtle SV twist.
